name: PingAfter
short: WHAT THE FUCK BOT!? YOU FINISHED WHILE I WAS NOT LOOKING!? Say nothing more, PingAfter will ping you so that you know!
description: You run a command. You wait for the command to finish. Well, you wait quite a long time. Hmm, it doesn't seem like it's gonna finish any time soon. You go make a coffee. You're back with a coffee. WHAT THE FUCK BOT!? YOU FINISHED WHILE I WAS GONE!? You could nuke your bot into oblivion for being so rude to you, but I do have an alternative! *This cog* can make your bot be forced to ping you after the command you ran sends a message back to you. No more long staring or forgetting that you ran the command!
install_msg: Oh, em, gee! Thanks Jack! Now I'm going to be forced to ping the command's caller if they tell me to. You're no fun, fucking virgin :|
author: Jakub Kuczys (https://github.com/Jackenmen)
